HomePage.title: Portfolio | RAMAHAZOMANANA Tsanta Mampionona
HomePage.description: Portfolio of RAMAHAZOMANANA Tsanta Mampionona, Full-stack JavaScript/PHP Developer.

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: Passionate about technological innovation and automation, I began my professional journey with a degree in Industrial Engineering from the Higher Institute of Technology of Antananarivo. My interest in new technologies led me to transition into software development.
About.paragraph2: My development journey started during my experience at Ingedata, where I discovered the potential of automation. I began by creating scripts using Chrome DevTools and developed extensions to improve UI/UX, marking the beginning of my passion for development.
About.paragraph3: Later, I designed a task tracking and productivity application using React, Node.js, GraphQL, and MongoDB. I also had the opportunity to work on a major building energy management project using React TypeScript and Node.js for a client fully remotely.
About.paragraph4: To further enhance my skills, I completed a retraining program in software development, where I gained in-depth knowledge of programming fundamentals, algorithms, as well as procedural and object-oriented programming. I also studied design patterns and agile methodologies.
About.paragraph5: Following this training, I worked on a payroll management project using React and Laravel. Currently, I am developing a room rental management application with React and Laravel.
About.paragraph6: In parallel, I am pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at the National Center for Distance Education of Madagascar, allowing me to continue exploring new professional opportunities, whether as a freelancer or in a full-time position.

Introduction.title: Mampionona - Full Stack Web Developer
Introduction.description: Specializing in the creation of complex applications such as ERPs and HR systems, I use technologies like React, Node.js, and Laravel to design high-performance and innovative solutions. Explore my projects in this portfolio.
